content.description:
CHURCH ATTENDANCE IN THE UNITED STATES, 1972-2010

Source: General Social Survey, 2010.
content.question: Which of the following is true about church attendance based on the line graph?

choices.label: About 30% of people surveyed in 2010 rarely or never attend church.
About 26% of people surveyed in 2010 attended church once a month or less.
About 16% of people surveyed in 2010 attend church about once a year.
About 54% of people surveyed in 2010 attended church once a year or less.

content.answer: About 54% of people surveyed in 2010 attended church once a year or less.
